title: Does anyone know what the new Google product branding font is?
content:
Hi guys,

Has anyone noticed the new Google font for each product? I hope someone can help me find out the answer. Here are a few examples:

[https://www.google.com/intl/en/images/logos/webmaster\_tools\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015614/https:/www.google.com/intl/en/images/logos/webmaster_tools_logo.gif "https://www.google.com/intl/en/images/logos/webmaster\_tools\_logo.gif")

[http://www.google.co.uk/products/intl/en\_uk/images/ps2.png?v=oXYdwmffXlY](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015614/http:/www.google.co.uk/products/intl/en_uk/images/ps2.png?v=oXYdwmffXlY "http://www.google.co.uk/products/intl/en\_uk/images/ps2.png?v=oXYdwmffXlY")

[http://scholar.google.co.uk/intl/en/images/scholar\_logo\_md\_2009.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015614/http:/scholar.google.co.uk/intl/en/images/scholar_logo_md_2009.gif "http://scholar.google.co.uk/intl/en/images/scholar\_logo\_md\_2009.gif")

[http://www.google.co.uk/intl/en/images/logos/translate\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015614/http:/www.google.co.uk/intl/en/images/logos/translate_logo.gif "http://www.google.co.uk/intl/en/images/logos/translate\_logo.gif")

[http://www.google.com/intl/en\_ALL/images/maps\_small\_horizontal\_logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015614/http:/www.google.com/intl/en_ALL/images/maps_small_horizontal_logo.png "http://www.google.com/intl/en\_ALL/images/maps\_small\_horizontal\_logo.png")

[http://video.google.com/img/logo\_videos.png?hl=en](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015614/http:/video.google.com/img/logo_videos.png?hl=en "http://video.google.com/img/logo\_videos.png?hl=en")

[http://blogsearch.google.com/blogsearch/intl/en\_ALL/images/blog\_search\_l...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015614/http:/blogsearch.google.com/blogsearch/intl/en_ALL/images/blog_search_logo.gif "http://blogsearch.google.com/blogsearch/intl/en\_ALL/images/blog\_search\_logo.gif")

Sorry for the prolific links, but the more the merrier! I look forward to any responses! Many thanks and kind regards,

Alex
author: sharifi14

comments.content:
Hi Alex,

see this recent thread:  
 [Google's thin sans-serif fonts in the new logos](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015614/http:/typophile.com/node/58262).  
F
Thanks for the responses. Apologies for not searching the forums more thoroughly. I'm not surprised that Hoefler & Freré-Jones created that beauty, that font is something else.
